mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raceHorse ( raceId, horseId, jockeyId, frameNumber, weight, old ) VALUE ( #{race.id}, horseId, jockeyId, #{raceHorse.frameNumber}, #{raceHorse.weight}, #{raceHorse.old} ) SELECT id as horseId FROM horse WHERE name = #{raceHorse.horse.name} UNION SELECT id as jockeyId FROM jockey WHERE name = #{raceHorse.jockey.naem}
